website_summaries.verdict: Simple industrial design in a wood and metal end table that looks great.
pros: Two-tier design in the end table gives you plenty of options for storing items on the bottom shelf
At 24 inches in height, it's a convenient size
cons: Table top and lower shelf are made of MDF board, not solid wood

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a table to keep wireless printer on that did not look like office furniture. This fit the bill. Assembly a breeze, it took ~20 mins. Instructions stated it need 2 people to assemble, I did it easily on my own. Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice industrial looking table
customer_reviews.text: Decent table for the price. We like the industrial look of the piece; however, the wood grain is a little artificial-looking (but not too bad). Very sturdy. Delivery was great and assembly was pretty straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: 765 kV

customer_reviews.title: Screw hole sinks came out when screwing in the legs ...
customer_reviews.text: Screw hole sinks came out when screwing in the legs. The wood it is made of is cheap fiber and rips them out when assembling. I had to use wood glue to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Superb little side table!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: This table definitely exceeded my expectations. I bought this to put fish tanks on but was uncertain how sturdy it would be so I had my fingers crossed. No worries here. I have a 4.5 gallon oval aquarium on the top and two 3.5 gallons circle ones on the bottom. Although not made of real wood, it is super sturdy and very modern. My 17 yr old son even commented that he liked it and wanted an identical one for his dorm room. Couldn't be happier with my purchase decision!!
customer_reviews.author: CollierTwin

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a few months now as an end table. Nice weight to it and the top has held up against sweating cups.
customer_reviews.author: BOYMOMof3

customer_reviews.title: Its just "OK"
customer_reviews.text: This side table looks alright, however for the price I feel like its a little cheap. The overall look is very nice. The only issue I had is the bottom part does not line up with the legs so it can not be screwed together, we just have the bottom piece sitting there. We bought the matching coffee table as well but it has not arrived yet. Hope we do not have the same issues!!
customer_reviews.author: Abbey

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced...
customer_reviews.text: For what I need, this will serve its purpose, bur this table is way overpriced. This is more like a $40 dollar table, not a $90 table. If you need something to hold your recording gear, that sits next to a computer desk... This is perfect (other than the price).
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hough

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: This company does great work making it easy for customers to assemble their product. It looks great and it is very strong. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: ivan sims

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great! Only complaint is that the wood is much darker in person than it looks in the photos.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsee Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Plastic, and doesn't align too well...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the look of this table and followed the positive reviews. The two "wood grain planks" actually feel like plastic. I got a shelf unit from the same company, and the shelves look and feel much more like wood even though they are clearly labeled as composite. The metal corners do not align and one side of one sticks out from a corner, and the other corner doesn't line up at all. It is stable and I will keep it in the corner of a room because it's not worth the hassle to try to return. I gave two stars for the look and the ease to put it together. The quality is sub par.
customer_reviews.author: Rina

customer_reviews.title: Look for less
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I purchased the coffee table and bookshelf to match. Easy to assemble and just the look i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kindberg

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble with all tools/parts included
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and was carefully packaged. Very easy to assemble with all tools/parts included. I ordered two and had them both assembled in less than an hour. Would definitely order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Richards

customer_reviews.title: Love this table!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table! Is the perfect height and the wood looks great. Also great around my little ones who spill all the time. Wipes right up off the table with no damage. Easy to assemble. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought the matching Coffee table and i love it beautiful all around high quality.. Cant wait to purchase the end table. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jelissa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable, simple
customer_reviews.text: These are great so far! Feels very sturdy. Was simple to put together. Love the texture. I know you can put liquids and other things on it without ruining it. They are the perfect size! Large enough to have lamps, remotes and plates on it.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Lienemann

product_meta.title: O&K Furniture 24” Height Square End/Side Table/Night Stand with Storage Shelf, Brown(1-Pcs)
product_meta.description:
Searching for a convenient table that can be placed comfortably in any place? Breathing new life into your home office with this industrial style End Table. Pairing rustically 
wood grain board with a powder-coated angel iron legs that blend the beauty of industrial style into any aesthetic. It is great little side table that will go with any decor.

The Features of This Accent / Side / End Table
★Founded atop four angel iron legs with rivet form arch design that certainly makes for eye-catching table.
★It is small and light enough to move around to use as tea tables or night tables in anywhere you want to place.
★Assembly and disassemble is a breeze and all tools and instructions needed are included for fast assembly.
★Perfect to be placed beside sofa or bed to keep your commonly used item such as books, night lamp and cups within easy reach.

Specification:
Overall Dimension: 22.6”(W) x 16.5”(D) x 24”(H) inches 
Table Top: 0.78" H x 16.5” W x 16.5" D inches. 

Table Top Thickness: 0.78-Inch
Overall Product Weight: 20.2-Lbs
Clearance - Floor to Bottom: 4.72-Inch

Top Material: wood grain board in brown finish
Base Material: angel iron legs 
Weight Capacity: 50 lbs per shelf

Package: 1* end table + hardware + instruction
feature_bullets: This minimalist style accent table is designed with barn-wood finish MDF board (not solid wood) and a cool powder coated steel frame.
The 2-tiers side table is great for placing lamp, books, magazines, bins and other household items, save space and makes items within reach.
Product dimensions: 22.6 (W) x 16.5 (D) x 24 (H) inches, height between shelves: 16.5 inches.
Use this wood and metal end table next to your couch or favorite chair or use them in your bedroom as night stand.
This chic end table coordinates with O&K furniture coffee table, bookcase and hall tree (sold separately). The ensemble will add an industrial style for your living space.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars21 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
